revised_title: Experiments on the Physiology and Genetics of Smut Fungi: Cultural Characters Part II
tldr: The author conducted experiments on the smut fungi, focusing on their cultural characters and the effect of external conditions on their segregation. They found that the inheritance of these characters followed Mendelian laws, with some exceptions. The study also explored the influence of environmental factors on the type of fusion and the behavior of the fusion nucleus in the fungi.
scientific_discipline: Biology and Life Sciences > Genetics and Molecular Biology
